ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Interface to 'Amazon Web Services' machine learning services, including 'SageMaker' managed machine learning service, natural language processing, speech recognition, translation, and more <https://aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/>.

Interface to 'Amazon Web Services' machine learning services, including 'SageMaker' managed machine learning service, natural language processing, speech recognition, translation, and more <https://aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/>.

name: r-paws.machine.learning
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-paws.machine.learning
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/paws.machine.learning_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/paws.machine.learning/paws.machine.learning_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2d74dba1d9a12618c5cd81e79cb06675cd356e38a9ec3148813f7e576fd5e2f8

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-paws.common >=0.8.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-paws.common >=0.8.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('paws.machine.learning')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('paws.machine.learning')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/paws-r/paws
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Interface to 'Amazon Web Services' machine learning services, including 'SageMaker' managed machine learning service, natural language processing, speech recognition, translation, and more <https://aws.amazon.com/machine-learning/>.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - achimgaedke
